description:
#nova volume-create
usage: nova volume-create [--snapshot_id <snapshot_id>]
                          [--display_name <display_name>]
                          [--display_description <display_description>]
                          [--volume_type <volume_type>]
                          <size>
error: too few arguments
Try 'nova volume-create help' for more information.

in fact,  last line should be:
 Try 'nova help volume-create' for more information.

This bug applies to all nova subcommands.
title: 'nova volume-create help' should be 'nova help volume-create'
